content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5), boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0) and offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5)

### Water supply system at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-18.5, y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-13.5, y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-3.5, y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-1.5, y=28.5), and pipe group(fluid system=506660)

### Steam supply system at position(x=-20.5, y=25.5)
Consists of boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0) and pipe group(fluid system=506765)

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of electricity group(id=86571) with poles at various positions

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler but being out of fuel
- Ensure there is coal in the inventory before attempting to use the boiler
- Make sure to move coal to the boiler's fuel inventory

### Errors when placing entities but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target position before attempting to place an entity

### Errors when connecting entities but having no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the entities are connected to a fluid system before attempting to use them
- Make sure that the fluid system is not empty

### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the fluid system is not empty

### Errors when using generator but not being connected to power network
- Ensure that the generator is connected to an electricity group before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the electricity group is not empty

### Errors when using pipe group but having no fluid present in connections
- Ensure that the pipe group is connected to a fluid system before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the fluid system is not empty
